item.name: account_locked
item.message: Your user account has been locked. To reactivate it, please you the "forgot password" function, which will send you a new password.

item.name: display_profile_field
item.message: When you don\'t want to display a certain profile field, just remove the tick from the respective field.

item.name: forgot_pwd_error
item.message: While sending the E-mail with your new password an error has occured.

item.name: forgot_pwd_description
item.message: Please either enter the E-mail address or the user name you used with the registration in the following input field.

item.name: forgot_pwd_mail_message
forgot_pwd_success
item.message: An E-mail with you new password has been sent successfully.

item.name: invalid_birthday
item.message: Please type in a valid birthday and how it should look like

item.name: invalid_icq_number
item.message: Please type in a valid ICQ number

item.name: invalid_msn_account
item.message: Please MSN-Account you have typed in, does not match a valid e-mail address

item.name: mod_description
item.message: With this module you can administer the users.

item.name: nickname_or_password_wrong
item.message: Either the user name, or the password is wrong.

item.name: register_error
item.message: While creating the user account an error has occured.

item.name: register_mail_message
register_success
item.message: The user account has been created successfully.

item.name: select_access_level
item.message: Please select an access level for this user

item.name: select_language
item.message: Please select the language in which you want to see the website

item.name: type_in_nickname_or_email
item.message: Please either enter the E-mail address or the user name you used with the registration

item.name: type_in_pwd
item.message: Either the password is empty or there is a typo in the repetition

item.name: user_email_already_exists
item.message: There is already an user account registered with the same E-mail address

item.name: user_name_already_exists
item.message: There is already an user account registered with the same user name

item.name: user_not_exists
item.message: There is no user profile registered with the typed in user name respectively the typed in E-mail address

item.name: user_profile_not_exists
item.message: The requested user profile doesn\'t exists.

item.name: users_found
item.message: In total there are %d users registered on this Website.
